data.actual_result: Client only shows already cached users and doesn't cache any that weren't cached before
data.expected_result: All users with results are cached into the client
data.short_description: Uncached users appear in Pinned Messages & Search (lazy guilds only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Search "In: {channel}" in a channel that has users with a coloured role (so it's easily noticeable) - Select Relevant to go back in message history easier
